name: Paper - A Game of Folding
description:
Paper - A Game of Folding is an origami puzzle game suitable for all ages. Fold simulated paper into various shapes & try to match the target... You are given a score based on how accurate you are. The game's mechanics are easy to pick up and play, but as the levels progress you'll need to think more and more about your folds to become an origami master.

Main Features

  • Unique simulated paper folding mechanics.
  • Over 60 hand crafted levels to master.
  • Relaxing, semi-procedural soundtrack.
  • Clean, minimal UI.
